content: What if you could have any job regardless of ability, money, circumstance, or talent? What job would you choose?
What if you could launch any product and success would be guaranteed? What would you launch and why?
What if money were no object and you could go back to school to learn for fun? What would you study?
What if you could spend the next two years gaining more experience in one particular skillset? Which area would you explore?
What if you could fully explore a childhood dream or interest that you were never able to fully discover? What would you explore?
What if you lived in a world where you were never judged or made to feel shame? How would you live differently?
